english.segment1: Verse 1. In the beginning. Before You set the world in motion. Uncreated God eternal
english.segment2: Radiant beauty. Infinite, the God head three in one. Perfect Father, Spirit, Savior
english.segment3: . Chorus: And it all begins and ends with You. It all begins and ends with You. The first the last the center of it all
english.segment4: And in You all things are held together
english.segment5: The sun the moon the stars the heavens. Creator God, the center of it all
english.segment6: . Verse 2. All of the Universe explodes in song before designer King. Valley shaper, mountain maker. The stars sing out, they canÂ’t contain the praises of their God. Earth creator, heaven shaker
english.segment7: . Bridge: Beginning of it all. The reason for it all. The centre of it all
